info.name: Nexus Mods Dark Theme - KMV
info.description:
Dark Theme for Nexus Mods.

Backgrounds are toned down - buttons and regular color themes are intact.
Relevant Drop-Downs have been inverted to be black instead of white.

Features custom cursors, :hovers, transitions and reduced image brightness & Dark Theme on Wiki, Help Sections and reCaptcha.

Optional Ad-Removal in Code 2.

Using Stylus will remove editor errors:
https://add0n.com/stylus.html

The rest of my themes:
https://userstyles.org/users/370722/

Contact:
https://www.reddit.com/r/KMV/
info.additionalInfo:
20191013 Published
20191014 Added Dark to Login Menu and Popups
20191101 Adjusted "Manage Mod" pages and fixed frontpage- & image preview overlay
20191110 Changed Description for Chrome users
20191114 Fixed Linear Gradient on tiles and Mod List. Hovers over items now included.
20191121 Likely a admin update on nexusmods today; Mod banners restored after becoming black. Hovers on submenu restored. Added darker backgrounds on selected items under Advanced Search Tab. Increased visibility of input-text.
20191210 Added Dark to non-member Speed Cap Notification and Membership Status in Account page.
20200103 Increased brightness of text on text-inputs.
20200201 Increased brightness of text on refine search input.
20200409 Fixed Black Log In text under Files tab, darkened a light background under File "Safe to use" and updated reCaptcha.
20201204 Added Dark to Cookie Consent Window and Buttons.
